metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9812 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
The gst_mpegts_section_new function in the mpegts decoder in GStreamer before 1.10.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via a too small section.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9812` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-gst-plugins-bad-1.0 - 1.10.2-1ubuntu1
gstreamer1.0-opencv - 1.10.2-1ubuntu1
gstreamer1.0-plugins-bad - 1.10.2-1ubuntu1
libgstreamer-opencv1.0-0 - 1.10.2-1ubuntu1
libgstreamer-plugins-bad1.0-0 - 1.10.2-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-bad1.0 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.10.2-1ubuntu1').
